channel.title: Making a safezone? where you get killed but don't loose stuff?
channel.description: i've recently added duely well part of it, and all i need to do is make the arena a safezone, i've done this many times but its been along time since i've added safezones, so if u could help me that will be ok.

item.title: Making a safezone? where you get killed but don't loose stuff?
item.dc:creator: @12mil 12mil
item.description:
@12mil wrote:

yes push that is correct, i’ve seen some tuts in the past but the people removed, can any1 help me?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 20, 2009, 03:11:08 pm[/size][hr]c’mon, please at least help me, anyone???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 20, 2009, 03:13:27 pm[/size][hr]Help?

Read full topic

item.title: Making a safezone? where you get killed but don't loose stuff?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

12mil:

im using delta, and i don’t have no “non wild” in my server its only “isinwilderness”, so i added my coord to “isinwilderness” and when i attack in that certain place it says its -137 wilderness and you need to move deeper into the wilderness? why? wdf?? help!

Uhh, you mean a place where you don’t loose items but can still attack, right? Not a place where it’s non-wildy and can’t attack, correct?

Read full topic
